content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position x1)
- Inserter (position y1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position z) that connects the furnace at position x to assembling machine at position x1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Verify that the furnace is operational and has items to inspect before checking its inventory. 

### Errors when crafting items without the necessary machines
- Ensure that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the recipe you are attempting to craft.
